game.alsoFor: Apple II, BBC Micro, Browser, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, Dragon 32/64, Electron, Exidy Sorcerer, FM-7, PC-88, TI-99/4A, TRS-80, TRS-80 CoCo, VIC-20, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
game.description: This is adventure #3 in Scott Adam's text adventure series. It takes place in a nuclear power plant. You must race against time to fulfill your mission or the reactor may be doomed. You use one or two word commands to move around and manipulate objects.
game.name: Secret Mission
